dcterms:description: The TVGE dataset collects human judgments on 2,543 text-to-video generated videos, focusing on two key aspects: text-video alignment and video quality. It serves as a benchmark for assessing the correlation between automatic metrics and human judgments in text-to-video generation.
dcterms:title: TVGE Dataset
